Wilmer, age 30, is an honest and hard-working man.  He lives with 30 year old Yohana and their four minor children.  They are raising the children in their own house, which is located in the Peruvian jungle (a native community in the center of Pumpuriani).  

He has been farming for seven years.  He gets up early every morning in order to help the workers that he regularly hires clear the weeds from his banana, yucca, and coffee fields.  Without the workers he would not be able to clear and maintain his fields, which are over three hectares.  

What Wilmer likes the most is being able to see the fruits grow strong and nutritious.  The weeds that grow among his plants affect production and do not allow the plants to grow.  Therefore, he has to take care of them all day in order to assure that his crops are profitable.

Wilmer is working very hard to be able to have quality products.  That is the way he will get greater income in order to build a more secure and comfortable house for his family.

This is his fifth loan with MFP.  He is very grateful for the help he has received during all of this time.  Without his communal bank he would not be able to make the changes that he has made.  Wilmer plans to use the loan he has requested to buy organic fertilizer (natural fertilizer) for his plants.  He will also use the loan to pay the workers that he hires.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer to pay laborers

loans.name: Santos Esmeralda

texts.es:
la sra. Santos Esmeralda Z. tiene 52 años de edad, vive en la colonia Villa Nueva y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, tiene una pequeña pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion, tiene muchos clientes ya que se encuentra en un lugar muy estratégico y que es muy transitado.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mas mercaderia y asi surtir bien su pulperia.
con su pulperia bien surtida tendra muchas ventas y por ende mas ganancias, las cuales las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Ms. Santos Esmeralda Z. is 52 years old, she lives in the neighborhood of Villan Nueva and engages in retail, selling popular consumer products. She runs a small corner shop located in her house, which is located in a very strategic and well-attended place, and as a result she has many customers.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy products and supply her corner shop.
The better her corner shop is supplied, the more products she will sell, thus earning more money that will be used to pay for her family expenses.

loans.use: To buy different popular consumer products to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
Maura es una pequeña comerciante, dedicada a la venta de ropa de segunda mano, venta de joyas y alquila un cuarto. Obteniendo así un mejor ingreso para los pagos básicos.
Iniciando con dinero propio que su ex esposo dio. Luego Atreves de de la institución ha logrado las mejoras de su vivienda, el incremento de su negocio. Lo que para ella es de gran beneficio poder tener su negocio en mejores condiciones de ventas ya que tiene muchos compromisos que pagar.
Con este financiamiento comprara: dos pacas de ropa mixta, paca de pantalón y paca de sabanas. Y lograr mejores ventas, el cual lo hace en su casa de habitación en donde los clientes se llevan hasta diez piezas. Y cada vez que compra paca le va muy bien.
texts.en:
Maura is a small businesswoman.  She sells second hand clothes, jewelry, and she rents a room.  That is how she gets a better income in order to make the basic payments.  She started with her own money that her ex-husband gave her.  Later, through the institution, she has managed to make improvements to her home and expand her business.

Having her business in better selling conditions has been a great benefit to her because she has many financial obligations.

With this loan she will buy two bundles of mixed clothes, a bundle of pants, and a bundle of sheets.  She will improve her sales, which she does from her house.  Her customers purchase up to ten pieces of her goods.  Each time she buys a bundle it goes very well for her.

loans.use: Buy a bundle of various garments to improve sales

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha,  es una mujer trabajadora de 46 años, que vive con Andrés de 60 años, con quien tiene 6 hijos menores; a los que cuida y educa en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Pumpuriani. Desde niña se dedica al noble oficio de la agricultura, ya que depende mucho de su trabajo que la tierra de frutos para poder alimentar a la población. Hace 20 años que; gracias a su esfuerzo y ahorro pudo adquirir terrenos de cultivo en los cuales comenzó a sembrar café, plátano y palta, los que después de brindarle el cuidado necesario los comercializa a sus clientes que visitan en su localidad. Sin embargo la siembra de palta le da mayor ingreso a Bertha, ya que es la única en su localidad que siembra ese producto y los comercializa en grandes cantidades a los comercializadores de todo el país. La actividad que más le gusta a ella es rozar (quemar los terrenos de cultivo, para sembrar unos nuevos), ya que con ello vendrán nuevas cosechas. Más adelante está planeando abrir una pequeña tienda de comestibles que mucha falta hace en su comunidad. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, y está muy entusiasta con los resultados obtenidos, ya que con su apoyo y capacitación podrá lograr sus objetivos. Bertha, tiene pensado invertir con el crédito, en contratar operarios, que le ayuden a limpiar la maleza de sus plantaciones de café, que dentro de 3 meses cosechará.
texts.en:
Bertha, age 46, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with Andrés, age 60, and they have six minor children.  She is raising the children in her own house, which is in the indigenous community of Pumpuriani.

Since she was a girl she has been working in the noble agricultural trade.  Being able to feed the population is very dependent upon her work and the productivity of the land.  Twenty years ago, thanks to her effort and her savings, she was able to get land for crops.  She started growing coffee, bananas, and avocados.  After giving them the necessary care she sold them to her customers that visit her.

However, the avocado crop gives Bertha the greatest income.  She is the only one in her area that grows this crop.  She sells them in great quantities to merchants throughout the country.

What she likes the best is burning her fields after the harvest. (This removes the old growth to make way for new plantings.)  That way there will be new harvests.  Later, she is planning to open a small, much needed grocery store in her community.

This is her fifth loan with MFP.  She is very enthusiastic about the results she has received.  With the support and the trainings she will be able to achieve her objectives.  Bertha plans to use the loan to hire workers to help her clear the weeds from her coffee crops.  The coffee will be harvested within three months.

loans.use: Hire workers to help clear the weeds

loans.name: Aleyda Marynee

texts.es:
Aleyda es una pequeña comerciante que ha crecido gracias a su tenacidad y apoyo de la institución. Se dedica al  negocio de la venta de ropa de segunda mano y cosméticos, pues lleva varios años con este negocio, iniciándolo con capital propio y aumentando su capital con Afodenic.

Lo cual para ella ha sido de mucho beneficio para poder apoyar  a sus tres hijos los cuales los tres estudian. Y solo con el dinero que aporta su esposo no da, ya que  la canasta básica esta con costos muy altos.
Con este financiamiento podrá comprar: paca, cosmético para lograr vender más. Y poder pagar lo estipulado del financiamiento en tiempo forma de los plazos.
texts.en:
Aleyda is a small businesswoman who has grown thanks to her tenacity and support from the institution.  She has a business selling second hand clothes and cosmetics.  She has had this business for several years.  She started the business with her own money, and she increased that with a loan from Afodenic.

The loan has been very beneficial for her.  She has been able to support her three children who go to school.  The money her husband contributes is not enough to pay for the very high price of the basic necessities.

With this loan she will be able to buy a bundle of clothes and cosmetics in order to sell more.  She will also be able to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy a bundle of clothes and cosmetics to increase her sales

loans.name: Elvin

texts.es: Elvin, de 45 años, es un hombre honesto y dedicado a su familia, él está separado de Marcelia, con la que tuvo 5 hijos,  pero como buen padre se dedica a cuidar de ellos; todos menores de edad, juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Pumpuriani. Desde muy niño se dedicó a la agricultura, cuando ya adquirió su familia, hace ya 22 años, comenzó a sembrar en sus propios terrenos agrícolas; comenzó con el plátano y el café, productos bandera en la selva peruana; pero sus años de experiencia y dedicación le enseñaron a sembrar “achiote”, cuyo procedimiento es muy complejo y muy pocas personas se dedican a su cultivo; lo que hace de Elvin uno de los pocos productores de la localidad.  Sus ventas le generan buena rentabilidad y por ende buenos ingresos; “los mismos comercializadores viene personalmente a comprar mis productos”, afirma. Más adelante quiere comprar su propio terreno agrícola, ya que los que siembra son terrenos de la comunidad; con ello piensa consolidar su producción y poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus hijos. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, y está muy agradecido, con las personas que le dan la oportunidad de poder salir adelante, ya que sin ello no podría obtener”algo más”. Elvin, tiene pensado comprar con el crédito que solicita, bolsas de abono orgánico (abono natural), además podrá pagar personal para mantener limpio su terreno de cultivo.
texts.en:
Elvin, age 45, is an honest man who is dedicated to his family.  He is separated from Marcelia; they have five children.  As a good father, he takes care of the children, who are all minors.  They live together in his own house in the indigenous community of Pumpuriani.

He has been farming since he was a little boy.  When he started his family 22 years ago he started to plant on his own fields.  He started with bananas and coffee, premium products in the Peruvian jungle.  With his years of experience and dedication he was taught how to grow “achiote” (annatto).  The process is very complex, and very few people grow it.  That makes Elvin one of the few producers in the area.

Their sales are very profitable and generate good income.  He says that, “The merchants come personally to buy my products”.  Later he wants to buy his own farm land.  The land he plants on now belongs to the community.  He plans to consolidate his production to be able to pay for his children’s university education.

This is his fifth loan with MFP.  He is very grateful to the people who are giving him the opportunity to be able to get ahead.  Without it he would not be able to get “something more”.  Elvin plans on using the requested loan to buy bags of organic fertilizer (natural fertilizer).  He also will be able to pay workers to keep his fields free of weeds.

loans.use: To buy bags of organic fertilizer and to hire workers
